response.overview: A pan-Indian biopic chronicling the life and sacrifice of Khudiram Bose, the young and iconic revolutionary who became one of the first and youngest martyrs of the Indian freedom struggle. The film follows his journey from his childhood in the Medinipur district, the profound influence of leaders like Sister Nivedita, to the high-stakes Muzaffarpur Conspiracy Case of 1908. At just 18 years old, Bose walked to the gallows with a smile, sparking a wave of nationalism across the country.
response.title: Khudiram Bose
